Package ch.pschatzmann.edgar.reporting

Class ValueField

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.edgar.reporting.DBField
      • ch.pschatzmann.edgar.reporting.NavigationField
        • ch.pschatzmann.edgar.reporting.ValueField
  • public class ValueField
extends NavigationField
    The value field which is not grouped needs to have an aggregate function defined. We use the SUM as default function
    Author:
    pschatzmann
